item.title: Pespila
item.description:
Features:

  • Registration of new accounts, including mail verfication
  • Login including password-reset functionality
  • Settings page where players can edit their profile and change their password
  • Upload of profile pics and banners
  • Profile Page for players and clubs
  • Ajax-based chat where players can communicate with each other
  • Timeline where the newest pictures and videos can be seen
  • An editor application where administrators can create club profiles and manage players (like uploading videos for them)
